text: @SouthernOracle4 Good old Mistress Slightly, Vimes thought, because it was dry, catch fire.

passages.fragment: Good old Mistress Slightly , Vimes thought ,
passages.full_quote: <used>Good old Mistress Slightly, Vimes thought, a</used>s he stood in this gloomy cave surrounded by ranks of silent, solemn goblins
The coach rumbled down the far end of the bridge and up a long drive to, yes, the stately home, presumably so called, <used>Vimes thought, because it was</used> about the size of the average state

passages.fragment: , because it was dry , catch fire
passages.full_quote: And they had found that lying down flat to blow on a fire because you hadn't started it with enough paper and dry twigs was not a good idea, because it would then cause your pointy hat, which you had forgotten to take off, to fall into the smoking mess and then, <used>because it was dry, catch fire</used>
